creator: cbohnert@eriscience.com
text:

creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
text:
Chris:
Have you:
1)used rmic to make stub and skeleton. the command is 
%JAVA_HOME%\Rmic -classpath d:\learn YourRMIInterface
2)Compile all java to classes
3)%JAVA_HOME%\rmiregistry

Finally did you code the implementation classes?
Here is a good primer on RMIC...
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.3/docs/guide/rmi/getstart.doc.html#5866

In the meanwhile you may want to suppress log in emails bug releases
as I could see your host and net names...
In any case let me know how you make out..
